name: Auto Rate
description: Automatically rate stars on unrated levels

issues.info: If you find any bugs, or have any feature requests, please post them on the github!

enable.name: Enable
enable.description: Allows you to soft toggle the mod!

enableDemon.name: Auto Demon Rating
enableDemon.description: Allows you to toggle auto rating demons

DemonRatingMethod.description: Toggle which demon rating should be used. Automatic will rate levels their current demon difficulty.
DemonRatingMethod.name: Demon Rating
